tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_reviews (
	dish_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_id UUID,
	review_text STRING,
	rating FLOAT,
	date_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE feedbacks (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 customer_name STRING,
 dish_name STRING,
 rating INT,
 comment STRING);

CREATE TABLE dishes (dish_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 dish_name STRING,
 cuisine_type STRING,
 dish_description STRING);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Feedback (
  feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name TEXT,
  dish_name TEXT,
  rating INT,
  comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Dishes (
  dish_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  dish_name TEXT UNIQUE,
  country TEXT,
  ingredients TEXT[],
  recipe TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Reviews (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_id UUID REFERENCES Feedback,
  dish_id UUID REFERENCES Dishes,
  review_date TIMESTAMP,
  review_text TEXT,
  rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    dish_id INT,
    rating INT,
    review TEXT
);
